title: BRIEF-Cematrix Corp Says Units Have Secured $2.2 Mln In New Canadian And U.S. Infrastructure Contracts
text:
BRIEF-Cematrix Corp Says Units Have Secured $2.2 Mln In New Canadian And U.S. Infrastructure Contracts

Stock Markets 52 minutes ago (Oct 04, 2019 12:20)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Cematrix Corp Says Units Have Secured $2.2 Mln In New Canadian And U.S. Infrastructure Contracts Oct 4 (Reuters) - CEMATRIX Corp : * CEMATRIX CORPORATION SECURES NEW INFRASTRUCTURE PROJECTS CONTRACTS TO DATE INCREASE TO A RECORD $33.0 MILLION * CEMATRIX CORP -UNITS HAVE SECURED $2.2 MILLION IN NEW CANADIAN AND U.S. INFRASTRUCTURE CONTRACTS * CEMATRIX CORP - "THESE NEW CONTRACTS CONTINUE TO FIRM UP ORIGINAL FORECASTS FOR 2019 AND BACKLOG FOR 2020 AND BEYOND"

BRIEF-Cematrix Corp Says Units Have Secured $2.2 Mln In New Canadian And U.S. Infrastructure Contracts
description: BRIEF-Cematrix Corp Says Units Have Secured $2.2 Mln In New Canadian And U.S. Infrastructure Contracts
